Title: Palindrome Reorder
Description: Given a string, your task is to reorder its letters in such a way that it becomes a palindrome (i.e., it reads the same forwards and backwards).
Input Specification: The only input line has a string of length n consisting of characters A–Z.
Output Specification: Print a palindrome consisting of the characters of the original string. You may print any valid solution. If there are no solutions, print "NO SOLUTION".
